channel.title: Humanity on Patrick Weston
channel.description: Recent content in Humanity on Patrick Weston

item.title: We Are All Humans
item.description: Anyone who knows me fairly well knows that I’m Catholic. To some though, the subject may never come up or we never get a chance to know each other close enough for it to be revealed. I keep things pretty under wraps publicly–I’m not afraid to share my faith, but I want to do it in a way that is organic. St. Francis of Assisi sums up my philosophy best:
